list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They have changed the time of the train
He has changed since I saw him last.

list_definition.definition: to give or leave (one thing etc for another)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She changed my library books for me.

list_definition.definition: (sometimes with into) to remove (clothes etc) and replace them by clean or different ones

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m just going to change (my shirt)
I’ll change into an old pair of trousers.

list_definition.definition: (with into) to make into or become (something different)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The prince was changed into a frog.

list_definition.definition: to give or receive (one kind of money for another)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Could you change this banknote for cash?

list_definition.definition: the process of becoming or making different

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The town is currently undergoing a lot of change.

list_definition.definition: a substitution of one thing for another

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ll have to give you a note – I don’t have any change.

list_definition.definition: money left over or given back from the amount given in payment

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He paid with a dollar and got 20 cents change.
He has been ill – the change will do him good.

list_ex_of_english: But she also knows that when she is old her mind will have changed.
You should say them all in the prescribed manner; do not change a thing.
Ideas can "become true" if the world changes.
The upshot of this is that adaptation to nonstationarity does not require qualitative changes in a learning algorithm.
In each experimental session, there was just one color change to the sky or sphere and just one test-surface color.
Co-ordination of head and eyes in the gaze changing behavior of cats.
Dark- and light-induced changes in coupling between horizontal cells in mammalian retina.
The screening system permitted a population approach for quantification of changes in seed population thermal behaviour in relation to dormancy loss.
